summary: Buy Homes, Rent Apartments & Sell Real Estate: Open Houses & Homes for Rent
developerAddress:
1301 Second Avenue, Floor 31,
Seattle, WA 98101
recentChanges: We are always working hard to improve our apps. This is a small update to fix a few bugs. Please continue to send your feedback to androidfeedback@zillow.com. We appreciate it.
comments: Its ok. Its best for home window shopping. If you're seriously looking, it's less convenient. It assumes how much you're going to put down and what interest rate you've been approved for. There's no way to set those things so it gives you a more accurate idea of what you're paying each month. Plus, in my area theres a lot of 55+ communities and theres no way to filter those out, which is irritating.

I like this app, overall, but would really love to have the ability to hide or dismiss a property from my search, if it's not one that meets my needs. I like that I can save homes, but when searching later, homes keep popping up that I would rather not look at again! Also, if there is a way to get HOA/Space rent to be mandatory when there is one for the property, that would be great. I've looked at many that stated there was none, but that wasn't true. Thanks!

Zillow gave the option to turn off cookies, but did not bother to mention that it will erase all of your data when you do this. I went ahead and typed everything in once again, and it erased it AGAIN. Also, you can't add photos, videos, or tours with any Android phone -only i0s I want to know what kind of incentive apple is giving developers to leave these flaws in their designs..

I use this app almost daily, it keeps me up to date on homes that I am very interested in. We will be buying or building in the next 5 months, we are looking forward to building or buying our dream home. I love Zillow, I have found it to be more up to date than a Real Estate office. I highly recommend Zillow. Thank you, carolintallahassee

While the interface is the best I've seen out of all the other real estate options, the information is not accurate or up to date. If you try to get information from the listing agent on the app, a third party starts messaging you and sending your information to unrelated agents. I simply messaged asking about an open house and some random dude was trying to get me a new buyer's agent even though I already have one.

title: English Dictionary - Offline
description:
The free offline English dictionary application explains the meaning of English words! Definitions are based on English Wiktionary. Fast search, easy and functional user interface, optimized also for tablets.
Ready to go: it works offline without any further file to download!

Features
♦ More than 356000 english definitions and large number of inflected forms
♦ You can leaf through words using your finger (swipe right and left)
♦ Manage your bookmarks, personal notes and search history
♦ Crossword help: the symbol ? can be used in place of single unknown letter. The symbol * can be used in place of any group of letters. The fullstop symbol . can be used to mark the end of a word.
♦ Random search button (shuffle), useful to learn new words
♦ Share word definition using other apps, like gmail or whatsapp
♦ Compatible with Moon+ Reader, FBReader and other applications via share button
♦ Backup&restore configuration, personal notes and bookmarks on local memory, Google Drive, Dropbox and Box clouds (available only if you have installed these applications on your device)
♦ Camera search via OCR Plugin, available only on devices with back camera. (Settings->Floating Action Button->Camera). The OCR Plugin has to be downloaded from Google Play.

Fuzzy search
♦ To search words with prefix, e.g. starting with 'moon', please write moon* and the dropdown list will show the words starting with 'moon'
♦ To search words with suffix, e.g. ending with 'moon', please write *moon. and the dropdown list will show the words ending with 'moon'
♦ To search words containing a word, e.g. 'moon', just write *moon* and the dropdown list will show the words containing 'moon'

Your settings
♦ Black and white themes with user defined text colors (press menu-->select Settings-->click on Theme)
♦ Optional Floating Action Button (FAB) supporting one of the following actions: Search, History, Favorites, Random search and Share option; Optional shake action with similar actions.
♦ Persistent Search option to get automatic keyboard at startup
♦ Text to speech options, including selection of British or American accent (press menu-->select Settings-->click on Text to Speech-->select Language)
♦ Number of items in history
♦ Customisable font size and line spacing, default screen orientation
♦ Start up option: home page, most recent word, random word or word of the day

Questions
♦ No voice output? Please follow instructions here: http://goo.gl/axXwR
Note: word pronunciation works only if voice data have been installed in your phone (Text-to-speech engine). 
♦ British word pronunciation not working? Please follow instructions here: https://cutt.ly/beMDCbR

♦ Question & Answers: http://goo.gl/UnU7V
♦ Keep safe your bookmarks and notes, please read: https://goo.gl/d1LCVc
♦ Information about permissions used by the application can be found here: http://goo.gl/AsqT4C
♦ Download also the other livio offline dictionaries available in Google Play for a broader and unique experience

In case Moon+ Reader does not list my dictionary: open pop-up "Customize dictionary" and select "Open dictionary directly when Long-Tap on a word"

⚠ An offline dictionary needs memory. In case your device has low memory, please consider to use the online dictionary: http://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=livio.dictionary

Information for application developers:
✔ This application provides Dictionary API for 3rd party developers, please read further details: http://thesaurus.altervista.org/dictionary-android

Permissions
This application requires the following permissions:
♢ INTERNET - to retrieve the definition of unknown words
♢ WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE (aka Photos/Media/Files) - to backup configuration and bookmarks

recentChanges: ♦ Enhanced to support Android 11
comments: The application is just perfect with a humongous range of definitions. I've been using it for years now but since last 6-8 months I am unable to use the pronunciation feature. Seems to have been botched. It hasn't been rectified despite umpteen updates. I request the developer to look into it. UPDATE : the function is back and as unflinching as ever. Thanks a lot for your support. 5 stars!

I genuinely love this app. One feature I wish this app would have tho is similar to that of Quick Dictionary's, like even when I'm on another app or reader and I click or copy a word, it instantly shows meanings and other infos of that word without actually leaving the reader/app. It's basically like a pop-up thing. That feature would make reading much more easier. Other than that, this app is perfect. I have other dictio apps, but I just can't let go of this one. Thank you so much!

This is the best dictionary app to use as it does not need the internet, has current words and slangs along with abbreviations defined, and also has an audio to help pronounce the word correctly. Although, there are some words not having much synonyms to allow a person to find alternative words when writing a paper of any sort. But all in all, this is a far better dictionary app

I've been using it for quiet a while with my pocketbook reader and it was perfect but since the latest update I'm unable to go directly to the searched word from the reader ( as it used to be ) but it points to the start page of the dictionary. This problem is commun to both English and French dictionaries. Thanks

Best dictionary I have ever used. It is offline and has a comprehensive description on every word's meaning. My favourite is the persistent search function and recommendation bar. It even has scientific words and many more which is very applaudable. I really recommend this application for all because I trust it WILL make you understand every word's meaning. Five stars to you, English Dictionary!

title: Wear OS by Google Smartwatch (was Android Wear)
description:
The Wear OS by Google app, previously Android Wear, syncs your smartwatch and phone so you can get more out of your watch. Get proactive help from your Google Assistant, see important messages, track health and fitness, and more, all from your wrist:

• GET PROACTIVE HELP FROM YOUR GOOGLE ASSISTANT: Stay on top of your day with proactive, personalized help and useful shortcuts from your Google Assistant. Get commute times, see upcoming reservations, check your flight status and more.
• TAKE YOUR HEALTH AND FITNESS FURTHER: Get healthier and more active by tracking your progress towards your Heart Points and Steps goal
• ROCK OUT WHILE YOU WORK OUT: Control your favorite music right from your wrist and stay motivated through the last mile
• STAY CONNECTED AT A GLANCE: Check important notifications, texts, emails, and calls at a glance
• GET MORE DONE: See your next meeting, add items to your grocery list, set reminders, pay on the go and more
• EXPRESS YOURSELF: Wear OS by Google lets you be you with hundreds of styles—from fashion to fitness to fun and thousands of watch faces you can customize

Learn more http://google.com/WearOS

Supported features may vary across watches, phones, and countries. The Google Assistant is not available in certain countries and languages.

title: Autism Treatment Evaluation Checklist (ATEC). ASD
description:
Check a person with Autism Spectrum Disorder (or someone you think has ASD).

The questionnaire, which is completed by a parent or teacher, takes about 10–15 minutes to complete and is designed for use with children ages 5–12.

If a child is younger than 2 years old, the test is strictly irrelevant. You shouldn't expect a six-month-old baby to "Can use sentences with 4 or more words", for instance. For toddlers between 16 and 30 months of age please use M-CHAT-R Autism test: https://www.autismspeaks.org/screen-your-child

Many parents and teachers use the ATEC to monitor how well the child is doing over time. In addition, researchers have used the ATEC to document improvement following an intervention by comparing the baseline ATEC scores with the post-treatment ATEC scores.

This test contains 4 chapters:

I. Speech / Language / Communication
II. Sociability
III. Sensory / Cognitive Awareness
IV. Health / Physical / Behavior

It basically provides several subscale scores as well as a total score to be used for comparison at a later date. 

Generally, the lower the score, the fewer the problems.

You can pass the checklist regularly and compare the results via the graph to track dynamics. App results will be more reliable if several persons contacting with a child with ASD will pass the checklist for one day. It gives average scores per day to compare later.

Important! The ATEC is not a medical diagnostic checklist to prove if someone has ASD. Contact specialists in your city for an accurate diagnosis if you have more than 15-20 scores.

summary: Test for autistic signs with tracking dynamics. Autistic spectrum disorder test
recentChanges: Fixed serious bug causes app to crash on Samsung and Huawei devices mainly.
comments: This is a great app to help maintain focus in specific areas of interest helping that overwhelmed feeling when a million resources are being thrown at you. Helps to focus in on the SPECIFIC needs of your child/children when the amount of "help" out there is so vast and so little of it pertains to MY CHILD'S challenges. Time is VERY precious to parents of children with autism challenges. This helps weed through what's not relevant to us.
Very important and useful, quick tool. Actually, it should be a national programme to promote it particularly in the areas where parents do not have access to basic advice .
Good test.... Very apt.

P. S. Thank you for your reply, I am a mother of a kid with autism, bringing him from low functioning to high functioning. I am just telling you that this questionnaire does not work. No age is mentioned and this can also confuse parents. I like your work and attempts. Pls contact me, we might do some apps together. I have a lot to share.

title: dataDex - Pokédex for Pokémon
description:
dataDex is an unofficial, beautifully designed Pokédex app for everyone to use.
It contains detailed data on every single Pokémon, for every main series game ever released, including  Sword & Shield and Isle of Armor DLC and Let's Go Pikachu & Eevee!

Multi-language support:
- English, Italian, German, Spanish, French, Portuguese, Hebrew
- Data only: Japanese, Chinese

Features:

Use the Pokeball multi-button to easily search, filter and sort the Pokémon, Move, Ability, Item or Nature you're looking for!
Filter Pokémon by game version, generation and/or type to focus your results!
dataDex also works OFFLINE, no internet connection required.

Pokédex
A fully featured Pokédex that includes detailed data on every single Pokémon.
Includes full entries, types, abilities, moves and so much more!

Team Builder (PRO feature)
A fully featured Team Builder - create your Pokémon dream team.
Choose a name, game version and up to 6 Pokémon to get a full team analysis,
Including team stats, type relations and move type coverage.
Tap any Pokémon in your party to customize even further with:
Nickname, gender, ability, moves, level, happiness, nature,
held item, stats, EVs, IVs and even your personal notes!

Location Dex
A fully featured Location Dex - Find out which Pokémon can be 
caught in each location, by which method, at what levels and more!

Move Dex
A list of all moves from all games.
Filter moves by generation, type and category!
Get the most important data in a glance, or tap on a move to get even more data!
Learn what Pokémon can learn each move quickly!

Ability Dex
A list of all abilities from all games.
Filter abilities by generation!
Tap on a ability to see all data!
Learn what Pokémon can have each ability!

Item Dex
A list of all items from all games.
Tap on an item to see all data!

Type Dex
Choose any combination of types to view its weaknesses and resistances!

Nature Dex
A list of all available natures.
Learn how each nature effect your Pokémon!

Favorites and Caught checklist
Easily mark any Pokémon as favorite or caught 
for quick and useful managment of your collection!

--

* Disclaimer *

dataDex is an unofficial, free fan made app and is NOT affiliated, endorsed or supported by Nintendo, GAME FREAK or The Pokémon company in any way.
Some images used in this app are copyrighted and are supported under fair use.
Pokémon and Pokémon character names are trademarks of Nintendo.
No copyright infringement intended.

Pokémon © 2002-2020 Pokémon. © 1995-2020 Nintendo/Creatures Inc./GAME FREAK inc.

recentChanges:
v3.9.8: * The Crown Tundra - DLC support update *
• Added: Location Dex support for The Crown Tundra DLC

comments: Pretty enjoyable, better than checking Bulbapedia multiple times for sure. Being able to check locations, sprites, moveset, type matchups, BST from all of the 890+ pokémon with no problems at all, is really satisfying. Interface is pretty solid, and even thinking that having to pay for the premium to use dark mode (who I'm a huge fan of), is still not a big of a deal, and for sure won't make me dislike this app at all. Probably my favorite Pokédex app I have ever seen. Keep up the good work! ❤️✨

I love this app, and all of the team builders that I can save. Its great for my mind that won't shut up. My only issue is that for the team builder, I can't select regional forms of pokemon for my team (i.e. Galarian Ponyta). I can evolve some (i.e. Pikachu) to it's regional form, but not the ones that don't have a split evolution. Aside from that, its a wonderfully made app with frequent updates!

This is amazing!! I can look at the locations and for the upper gens 5-8, I can actually check the area, like for Sword and Shield, not only does it tell me where the pokemon appears in, but I can see the conditions such as "It only appears when it's raining". If I have one problem though, it has to be the cries of the gen 8 pokemon. They sound very low quality and in some cases, it sounds a bit like your device's speaker is broken. Crown Tundra is here, aling with the locations!

This app literally has everything you could possibly want in a pokedex app. It has a full pokedex/itemdex for information and location, and team building with in depth analysis of weaknesses and coverage. There is nothing left out! I dont see how any other app can compete with what dataDex offers. Not to mention they update the app often so they are always giving the most new and accurate information! 5/5 EZ

Very nice app, and it could be great! Would love to see the ability to search through all available swsh pokemon, and not have them broken up by galar/isle of armor/crown tundra. It's super nice that I can sort the dex by a stat, but i wish i could sort every pokemon. Also, there are some issues with the move dex. I don't think that the "Pokemon who learn this move" works right. I'd also love to be able to sort by moves available in swsh. Not just moves introduced in swsh, and no removed ones.

comments: Every so often, when metro zone pops up on my cellphone screen, I would take a few minutes to read about what is taken place in my neighborhood and community. I find metro zone to be very informative, and straightforward in delivering the news.
I am very satisfied with my T-Mobile service and I love the metroZone news feed, along with countless other personalized features that comes along with the service.
Great Information I find helpful a lot of the time, As well as many games to play for free. I enjoy it.
metro zone keeps me up to date with all latest news. I like the option where you can filter what news is for me.
Always gives me a broad range of subjects and articles to look into and even some I wouldn't normally look for myself. I love the fortune cookie and horoscope as well.

title: Mobile Strike
description:
Become an action hero like Arnold Schwarzenegger in the new game of modern war -  Mobile Strike! Build a base, control the action, and test your elite troops against enemies on the battlefield! With cutting-edge assault vehicles in your arsenal this worldwide MMO game tests your ability to wage a tactical and intelligent war. 

It's not whose arsenal is bigger, it's whose arsenal is best! Design a customized base to reflect the kind of hero you want to be. Amass defenses to protect your base, or manufacture an arsenal unrivaled on the battlefield! In true MMO fashion you can join an alliance and bring to bear the benefits of a multilateral force as you dominate the action and become the Head of State in an entirely new kind of action game!

✔Join with millions of players from around the world
✔ Forge powerful alliances with elite players against formidable enemies
✔ Build and customize your base
✔ Engage with rogue war machines on the battlefield to collect items and experience
✔Train, level up and supply your commander with superior firepower
✔Use modern combat vehicles, artillery, and strategic units
✔Command 4 military tiers consisting of 16 troop types

Check out the elite new MMO Mobile Strike, a war game to end all war games!

Privacy Policy: https://www.mobilestrikeapp.com/privacy-policy?lang=en
Terms of Service: https://www.mobilestrikeapp.com/terms-of-use
Game Page: http://epicwar-online.com

comments: To be honest a lot of post on here about the game(mobile strike) being pay to win is pretty much 80% acurate there are some times your base is better but then there comes the dude that spent $20 more than you and just claps all your troops the game has alot of potentail but is already a failing game just becuase the game devs just want so extra money. So yes this game isnt a good game its pay to win.

Cost to much ti play i have been playing this game for years i spent alote of money on it and the change up to cyber we that were playing before that had to spend much more and the stuff we bought before we cant even use even the game packs have alote of stuff but there is 80%of it is stuff u cant use note that we should have renberse use for what we paid for and lost cause of the change up

Game is good, but when you start you encounter bullying by way of dealing with continue killing of your troops. Get a good alliance an you can build up. For starters slow to building up but worth the challenge.
I played this several years ago and purchased quite a few packs. I have tried to download this recently and due to extravagant changes to the game, it will not even download. Disappointed.
Just got the game today and already seems to be a lag in the game. Not sure whats going on, internet is working its just the tutorial part of it.

title: Metro Name ID
description:
Stop unwanted calls with Metro Name ID and say goodbye to scammers, telemarketers, and other questionable callers. With Name ID, you can block these callers, and block or manage any other phone number. Name ID also identifies callers—even if they’re not in your address book—letting you choose who you talk to. Reverse number lookup is included as well, so you’ll never have to wonder who called you.

Metro Name ID features:

- Identify and block likely scam calls 
- Identify and block unwanted callers
- Identify and send call categories to voicemail—telemarketers, surveys, political callers, and more 
- Identify unknown callers
- Report call violations 
- Reverse number lookup

520 Main Street
North Little Rock, AR 72114
recentChanges: Security updates and enhancements.
comments: Sept 28, 2020 MetroPCS by T-Mobile changed to the Scam and Spam app . Updated January 6, 2020 from 2/25/19 Absolutely the best $2.50 a month ever! No more Telemarketing, scams, or annoyingly winded people. Blocks Telemarketers! This particular app has worked for me over a year now. Still working like a charm. Ha, Make it year 3!The best company in the States for service is MetroPCS by T-Mibile. Service, connection, and the people are great. X 💚🐢

I have appreciated this name id blocking unwanted calls until today when it blocked a contact of mine. Now I'm wondering how many other contact calls have been blocked without knowing...I hope this glitch gets fixed!!!

I like it very much, however the 1 thing I don't like is the list of numbers stay forever. Also the old way 1 could check a number if one got thru. Is there anyway to clear the numbers in the activity sectipn? I have a list that goes back over 8/9 months. I use it often however still have the same problem with the ph. nbrs. Is there a way to delete some of the old nbrs?
I'm so glad I have this! With so many scams I've gotten where I dont want to answer any calls but now, stopping them has been easy. Although, I wish it included text messages as well.

I am a maintenance supervisor and I'm busy all through the day and it's really nice to not be getting a lot of unnecessary phone calls to interrupt me while I'm doing things I truly appreciate this app and all that it does for me thank you so very much.

title: Topface - Dating Meeting Chat
description:
Topface allows you to find interesting people, girls, and guys with similar interests and hobbies all around the world. It can be used to find new friends for keeping in touch, communicating, and possibly for other things as well.
When using Topface, you’ll see that you can meet with those who you want. It’s so easy!

✔ To use Topface, you don’t need to pay any money
✔ 100 million people around the world are already using Topface, to match for people they are interested in.
✔ To start using the application, register, or just use your Facebook account.

In just 5 minutes on Topface more than 50 individuals will see you and want to get acquainted! Not only that, but your profile will garner upwards of over 100 likes!

developerAddress: Amathountos, 202 MARINA GARDENS A, Flat/Office 8-9 Parekklisia, 4533, Limassol, Cyprus
recentChanges: Thanks for updating our app! We regularly update our app in order to improve the speed and functionality of your dating experience. When new features are available in your area, we’ll notify you in the app.
comments: There are tons and tons of fake accounts and many uses the same image och their account . First I thought it was a glitch when I matched with two people with same image but as it turns out, it was two different accounts.
This is a great app without the extras and hassle that comes with other apps. I travel frequently and use it in each locale. More people should join the party!
Excellent and had really good luck with this app, over the year had really good success with this app and I absolutely recommend and five star thumbs up
Its good but very slow to load and sometimes it doesn't get to load at all
Really good. Plenty conversations only downside is no notifications and a little bit slow to load message etc bit worth it !

title: Emma's Adventure: California
description:
Hey, adventurers! Welcome to gold rush California. Here you will be exploring the rich and dangerous land and building your own farms and city together with Jim, the Gold Miner, and Emma, the country girl. As you know, no matter how careful you are, dangers may happen on the way to gold mining in the wild west. Let's try to get it over and find the rare treasure!
Features:
• Build your dream village, town and city with unique farms, gardens, factories, production buildings and decorations!
• Complete all kinds of challenging quests to discover the secrets of California!
• Take good care of your own farm where you can keep pets and animals, harvest crops and make food!
• Meet strange people and fascinating events during the adventure in the mysterious land!
• Build your own commercial empire by selecting appropriate quests and completing farm orders from the locals with collection and production!
• Explore the wild lands and enjoy the invaluable scenery of nature!
It's Gold Rush time! Let's enter the fun game now with beautiful natural landscapes and start a legendary adventure through the valley, desert, and snowfield in this amazing land.
California at the gold rush era has the best seaside and farmlands, where you can raise animals and harvest crops, collect resources and craft tools, and build your own village, town, and city, buy and sell properties, and explore hidden treasures and gold mining on your expeditions to the far mysterious wilderness. Escape from the real life and be an adventurer in this paradise!
Play Emma’s Adventures: California now and enjoy farming and harvesting.
If you have any problems and questions during your adventure, or if you'd like to share your special story with us, please feel free to contact us in the following ways:
- Send E-mail to: emmaadventureca@gmail.com
Or
- Comment on Facebook：www.facebook.com/AdventurCA

The adventure continues

comments: Enjoying playing the game. It's so addicting I'm going to have to set a timer. I really like the game but I continually get a network error then the game reloads. With the help of Emma's Adventures tech I no longer have problems. I unplugged my router for about three minutes then plugged it back in. After getting back online, everything is running smoothly. In the future, I'll unplug and see if thar fixes the problem before driving the tech crazy with all my messages to them for help.

I like the challenges and how you build up your town the way you want it . I have been playing this game for a while now and still like it but 2 major issues . The ships that come in you should have the same option as the train to let it go even if you haven't filled it . The guild is not great most of the time its too hard to help people compared to other games such as township in that game being part of a guild is what makes the game fantastic. a few changes would make it fun and enjoyable.

So far the best game I have played from play store. I have not spent any money. I am level 53. They always add more content to keep playing. Not everyone will like this game because we are all different. Most people will find it just fine. It is not a pay to play game but if you like it...you can support the developers by buying things if you wish to. I have received no compensation for this review nor do I want it. This is a great game!

Very slow. Not able to advance as quick as I would like to. Stuck on home, going around the crops and animals, since started. Unable to go to other areas without getting stuck. !!!!! Has improved a lot. / Hate it when it goes off while playing at a good moment..... One problem is as I am working on this game, it switches off. So frustrating 😡 . How long will I have to put up with this?

I really like this game but the further you progress in the game, the more energy points it takes to do anything. You spend all your time filling orders just to kill time until you have enough energy to actually play the levels. And then you only have enough energy to clear a bush or two and then wait for an hour. Clear a bush, wait an hour. It becomes far too tedious to want to continue.

title: Handicap Calculator : Squash
description:
This HANDICAP CALCULATOR : SQUASH app is one of a series of racket sports handicapper apps. It calculates the players’ starting points position by blending elements derived from their Age, Gender and Skills - their personal player profiles. 

The aim is to equalise winning opportunities for all players. 

It should encourage both men and women to prolong their involvement in this sport as
-	 it allows all to continuously achieve competitive results
-	sets realistic challenges
-	enables genuine achievement
-	is simple to use
-	takes 20 seconds or so to complete the overall process, per pair 
-	works

Remember - a starting points position of 0:0 is often most unequal 

FEATURES

Just two screens, HOME & CALCULATOR
-	HOME has a very brief introduction to the App
-	CALCULATOR uses the selections of Age, Gender & Skill for the 2 players
which, when combined with the games’ points target of either  11 or 15, creates and displays the players’ suggested starting points

THE :HANDICAP CALCULATION   
-	uses Age and Gender values built on the principles detailed in many published research and statistical analyses for related sports performance - an objective approach 
-	uses a multi-level set of skills - more subjective 
-	includes a limit on the points split in order to avoid too broad a handicap
-	shouldn’t spoil the game from either players’ perspective 
-	method is unique 
-	uses some science, some art 

It’s for
-	uses some science, some art 
-	all SQUASH sports players, across the world, whatever standard
-	from age 20 to 81 inclusive,
-	from Beginners to those Top in the pool individuals, player groups, clubs, team, squad, leagues, competitions, associations, organisers, coaches, fun and social occasions and so on

AGE
-	the age factor is important, the rate of decline in sports performance starts slowly and increases significantly in the late 50s and beyond
-	an Age-based points difference calculation is included here to recognise the proven impact of ageing on sports performance 

GENDER
-	published research proves that Gender is a significant factor determining sporting results
-	a Gender-based points difference has been duly incorporated into both the ageing and skill element calculations

SKILL
-	this :Handicap system respects well-earned skills
-	the choice of skill level here for a player should be appropriate to the group being considered

BENEFITS
-	consistent calculations from a range of factors
-	creates tight games
-	more unpredictability of match result
-	promotes challenges
-	equalise opportunities 
-	rewards effort
-	more fun
-	supports ‘can do’ attitude 

Playing sport frequently and regularly helps people to
-	maintain good fitness and sound general health
-	achieve a true active status
-	feel better
-	play better 
-	achieve better mental health

comments: This is the squash app I've been looking for! Let's me play competitive games with all levels of players - instead of me getting hammered all the time..!
just what I've been looking for! excellent. 99p well spent.

title: Summoners War
description:
An action-packed fantasy RPG with over 100 million Summoners around the world!

Jump into the Sky Arena, a world under battle over the vital resource: Mana Crystals.
Summon over 1,000 different types of monsters to compete for victory in the Sky Arena.

Assemble the greatest team of monsters for strategic victories!

Summoners War: Sky Arena

Summoners War Official Community: 
https://www.facebook.com/SummonersWarCom2us/

***
▶Features
[Strategic Gameplay]
Witness the dazzling display of each Monster's unique skills.
21 different Rune sets to pick and choose additional abilities for your monsters!
Come up with the best strategy to win battles.

[Endless Fun]
Decorate your Village, battle other summoners, explore Dungeons, fight in PvP battles, expand your Collection, train Monsters, and more.

[Massive Collection]
Fire, Water, Wind, Light and Dark!
5 different attributes, and 1000 different monsters!
Collect as many monsters as you can and assemble the greatest team.

[Real-time Raid]
Battle as a team!
A real-time battle with 3 users!
Defeat the boss with your fellow Summoners using various tactics.

[Homunculus]
The Forbidden Summoning Magic has finally been revealed!
You can Evolve the skill of your choice with this special Monster.
Summon Homunculus and show off your strategy.

[Crafting]
You can Craft more than 100 items at the new Craft Building!
Craft High Runes, special Buildings, Statues and more with the new Craft System and install them wherever you want.

[World Arena]
Enjoy a real-time battle with users worldwide!
Experience a breathtaking battle that starts from Pick&Ban!
Reveal your unique strategy to the world!

[Guild Content]
A sensational Guild PvP in the Isle of Conquest!
Explore the Tartarus' Labyrinth with Guild Members.
Make your Guild the greatest of all.

[Dimension Hole]
The closed Dimension Hole is now open!
Fight against the ancient power of different dimensions.
Defeat the Ancient Guardians and meet the powerful Monsters with new awakening power.

[Artifact]
New equipment, Artifact!
Fight against the powerful bosses and acquire new rewards in return.
Enhance the power of your Monsters with Artifacts and the various properties that Artifacts possess.

***
Device App Access Permission Notice
▶ Notice per access permission
Access permissions are requested in order for us to provide you with the following service when you use the app.

[Required]
None

[Optional]
STORAGE: The permission is required to store game data and will not access personal files such as photos.
PHONE: The permission is required to proceed with in-game events and rewards and will not affect calls.
CONTACTS: The permission is required to sync your friend list and Google Account.
AUDIO: The authority is required to use the voice feature.

※ You'll be able to enjoy the service except features related to above authorities even if you don't give permission to the above.
※ If you are using an Android version under 6.0, it is recommended that you upgrade the version to 6.0 or up as you cannot set the optional access permission individually.

▶How to remove access permissions
After allowing the access permission, you can revoke or modify the access permissions as follows:

[OS 6.0 and up]
Settings > Apps > Select the app > Permissions > allow or deny permissions

[Under OS 6.0]
Upgrade the OS to deny access permission or delete app

***
Summoners War is available in 16 different languages:
English, 한국어, 日本語, 中文简体, 中文繁體, Deutsch, Français, Português, Español, Русский, Bahasa Indonesia, Tiếng Việt, Türkçe, العربية , Italiano and ไทย!
***
• Items are available for purchase in this game. Some paid items may not be refundable depending on the type of item. 
• Terms of Service: http://terms.withhive.com/terms/policy/view/M9/T1
• Privacy Policy: http://terms.withhive.com/terms/policy/view/M9/T3

• For questions or customer support, please contact our Customer Support by visiting http://customer-m.withhive.com/ask

recentChanges:
A global RPG that mesmerized users worldwide!
Win battles with unique decks!

- New mode added to the Trial of Ascension

comments: I've been playing this game on and off for 3 years, and this is the first time I've ever had issues getting onto the game. Lately, the game opens up in portrait mode. Nothing is accessible in portrait. My phone doesn't lock in portrait. I click, rotate my phone to landscape, opens in portrait, and I force close, just to open back in portrait. 9 tries in a row.. all portrait. I've held my phone in portrait mode multiple times this year, and it would always open game in landscape...till now.

I love this game so much. Its so fun and you something to do pretty much everyday. The monsters are so adorable and I love the feeling I get when I summon a monster I have been wanting for awhile. I recommend this game as it has kept me coming back and all the events are so amazing. Summoners has got to be my favorite mobile game out there!

Nostalgia. Played for 2 years since beginning. Coming back after 2016 because of lockdown. So many memories. Would really appreciate if the battle slow-mo animations could be manually turned off. For someone who's working and has limited time to play, it would be a great thing as it will enable one to progress and make it possible for one to spend all arena points, dimensional energy in that time. That's my one and only wish for the game. Edit: Auto farm has made a good game many times better.

I had originally rated this game as 5* however i now feel this to be too high. The game overal is great but certain things let it down: Summon rates too low; Violent Rune procs destroy the game; The recent Street Fighter event was nice however i got every Street Fighter scroll possible from the various events and TOA, they all gave me Wind Chun Li. To say i was frustrated by that was an understatement, surely rng would mean getting at least a different version (water/fire/light/dark) but no.

They don't respect your time, and they respect your wallet WAY too much. You'll grind for hours, days, weeks, months, and make very little progress. The drop rates are the lowest of any gacha I've played, and the game is very much pay to win. Except you can't even guarantee rewards for your money, so if you like to spend on these games prepare to spend a LOT to make up for low rng. If you have problems with spending or gambling in any way, DO NOT get this game.

title: MetroZone
description:
What if every phone unlock made your day just a little better? Imagine unlocking in the morning, and the weather is already there.

Imagine unlocking while you’re waiting in line or at work, and there’s already a beautiful photo gallery waiting to help you relax and escape the grind. Or maybe, for you, it’ll be local events that’ll make you look forward to your downtime, or just the top headlines in news, sports or entertainment to stay informed.

We call them “smart” phones; shouldn’t we expect more from them? Get more from those little moments in between, when you unlock your phone.

Unlock the power of MetroZONE today!

comments: At first I viewed the pop-ups as an annoyance, but after awhile I began to click on the Fotoscapes & Lookbooks, which have very interesting pictures and articles, and found them to be quite enjoyable. Then I started trying out all the different games available, & found I enjoy playing them. I esp appreciate having access to all those games without having to download separate apps for each one. I look forward to seeing MetroZone when I turn on my phone now.

Love the stories, articles, and pictures that are available on this app. However if you hit back at the wrong time or click on another story, you have lost that great item of whatever you were looking at for that moment. . So many good stories I was looking at but lost them that way. And still haven't found them. . Is there a way to avoid this???or solution to fix this..

I absolutely HATE that every time I open my phone, this is popped up. And it's almost impossible to close with the combination of lag and the home bar not being on my screen. It'll click on an article when I try to swipe up to hit the home button. Then it takes ten years to finally close out the unwanted redirection. I'm seriously considering switching services because of this god awful pop up annoyance.

Some of the information is not appropriate to watch and some give too much details. Which takes too long to get to end of story. If you lose page accidentally it hard to get back to where you left off. That make you not want to open story to fine out how, what, why,and when it happens. So I find myself just reading the captions and doing the few selections of pictures. Thank you always for your variety of subject matter.

I did NOT ask for this app to automatically pop up once I unlock my phone!! It is extremely agrivating because I cannot just "uninstall this app!?!?" It is also very agrivating & annoying to try getting off of the app to get to my homescreen. I wish I had the option to use the app or not... Why even make a shortcut to access the app when it just (automatically) pops up???

comments: This app allows access to carrier services far better than the previous update. Whereas before, my carrier services were running sluggish, now they are much faster and more well maintained. I thoroughly enjoy the smoothness and quick transitions. The app operates just as you'd expect, in a fast, complete, not to mention timely, as well as stylish manner. I cannot recommend this enough. Since this app is a gift from god, I say it's high time for a cult to be formed. Hail carrier Services!

I have never had any problems with this absolutely much needed APP. I did go to the assurance wireless phone store, through assurance wireless, I got a great LG DYNASTY. This phone works great with the assurance wireless service. No issues calling or receiving calls, data, or text, anywhere in the great 48 states. My husband and I have traveled back and forth to from Kansas to Oregon and back again, to Arkansas then back to Kansas.. My cell service only failed, when everyone's did...

This app worked fine for me when I installed this for Google Messages on my Note 10 5g. I did so for chat features. My husband has a Galaxy S10+ and it is saying his carrier does not support this service. I'm not sure how that works, considering they are literally on the same plan. It just keeps saying retry, verifying phone number when I try to enable chat features. I would give 5/5 if it worked.

My phone is unreliable since the last update. The phone body is hot, my battery is low after 2 hours. It turns off randomly, I even had to buy a classic alarm, because when I go to bed, my phone turns off during the night despite the battery was fully charged. Please please do something! This app eats up my new phone what haven't had any problems before.

ever since the last update that I did things have been shutting down right and left and I have been doing a little bit of research and cannot understand why two similar apps have to be installed on our phone such as Carrier services and carrier hub when basically they both do the same thing if one is reading the description in the Google Play store

title: Moto Actions
description:
Interact naturally.
 
Moto Actions responds to simple gestures to make daily tasks quick and easy.
 
·         Turn the flashlight on and off with two chopping motions
·         Twist your wrist twice quickly to open the camera anytime
·         Use the fingerprint sensor to navigate
·         Swipe down to the left or right to make the screen smaller for one-handed use
·         Lift the phone to switch incoming calls to vibrate
·         Place the phone face down to silence notifications and calls
 
Open Moto app to know more about these features.
 
Important: Some of these features may not be available in your device.

comments: Please add charging notifications to moto display as some devices don't have a notification light. This can lead to overcharging but if this is added to give a notification when the battery reaches a variable percent it will help a lot of people.

Please give three finger screenshot with scrolling down because i always need to tap my three fingers on display and it sometime doesn't work but i am a gamer play with four fingers sometimes it mistakely takes screenshot while playing the game and also why you people don't give any good one button navigation bar that we see on others smartphone why it always needs to control with fingerprint i want it on the display just like iphones but don't want to control with fingerprint MOTO BAD COMPANY

Please provide customized screen splitting rather than half splitting. User can set by any proportion. If possible multiscreen splitting. Users want to see different content at the same time in a proffessional work. It also good for study purpose.

3 fingers screenshot is not working properly. May times i couldn't able to take a screenshot by using this feature. Pissed off of using this ... Infact it would be more convenient if this feature is in notification area. I.e the drop down menu... On the other hand, there is no call recording option available. Which i think is a must. I had download multiple of app for call recording purpose.. but its a failure. No app works with Moto 5 s+..….

title: Digital Secure
description:
Protect your private information from digital threats. 
Digital Secure is a one-stop suite of privacy and security tools for your mobile devices and home computers. Safeguard your internet connection and personal data with antivirus, anti-malware and identity theft protection so you can browse with peace of mind. 

Here’s what you’ll get with Digital Secure.
You’ll get free security and privacy tools, plus you can get advanced protection for $5/mo per line or $10/mo per account.

1. Security and Privacy
Protect your device from online threats and get around-the-clock peace of mind. 
Get warnings when connecting to an unsecure network, visiting risky websites or attempting dangerous downloads. Plus, you’ll be able to see how installed apps are currently using your personal information. 

2. Safe Wi-Fi 
Connect with confidence to any public Wi-Fi. 
With Digital Secure, it’s easy to make any Wi-Fi connection private. You’ll get an on-the-go secure VPN connection so you’ll be able to keep personal data and online activities to yourself. 

3. Identity Theft Protection (IDTP)
Take control with always-on IDTP and social media monitoring, dark web surveillance and theft alerts.
24/7 cyber monitoring means you can be notified if we detect any personal information you’ve asked us to monitor is shared online. You’ll also get step-by-step guidance from recovery and replacement specialists if essential items such as credit cards and IDs are lost.

comments: I straight up didn't install this app. I've never used it or opened it either but it was taking up lots of my battery (about 1% which is a lot for an app that I have literally never opened). I'm assuming my provider (Verizon, surprise, surprise) downloaded this app automatically during an update to my phone which is fantastic, since I was never alerted of this (read: sarcasm).

Complete Battery Hog. I have to disable the web protection settings or it chews up my battery life in a matter of hours. According to my battery usage stats, Verizon's "anti-virus scanner" uses up more battery than Facebook, Instagram, Twitter and Mobile Games. On some days, Combined. Samsung Galaxy S10.

I have been a subscriber with VERIZON for about 14 yrs. I have been more than satisfied with the cell svc, their products they sell, the support teams, and most of all the protection products they offer. This particular app is of the highest quality out on the market. Can't go wrong with this one!!!

This is trouble some to me I have a 1 in the app window all of the time I do not know what to do of the 1 in the app window need help clearing the 1 in the app window . Cause of this happening to people much in proving is needed to correct the problems with this app here????? Unknown if app window problem location/link & intternet problem double check from your end.

Since the app was installed i cannot access my printer to print emails from my phone. This app sucks. I originally thought it was my printer now I am finding out it is my phone. I have been a Verizon customer for years. I am considering a switch to another company.

title: Bubble Witch 2 Saga
description:
From the makers of Candy Crush Saga, Bubble Witch Saga & Farm Heroes Saga comes Bubble Witch 2 Saga!

Stella and her cats need your help to fend off the dark spirits that are plaguing their land. Travel the realm bursting as many bubbles as you can in this exciting bubble shooting puzzle adventure. Win levels and free Witch Country piece by piece. Play this epic saga alone or with friends to see who can get the highest score!

Bubble Witch 2 Saga is completely free to play but some optional in-game items will require payment.

By downloading this game you are agreeing to our terms of service; http://about.king.com/consumer-terms/terms

Bubble Witch 2 Saga features:
• The next exciting instalment to the Bubble Witch franchise 
• New and improved game modes
• Enchanting graphics that will leave you spellbound
• Hundreds of magical bubble shooting levels – more added every 2 weeks!
• Easily sync the game between devices when connected  to the Internet
• Leaderboards to watch your friends and competitors!
• Collect stars to unlock special items to help you on your quest 
• Special boosters & bubbles to help you pass those tricky levels
• Free & easy to play, challenging to master!

Visit https://care.king.com/ or contact us in game by going to Settings > Customer Care if you need help!

Follow us to get news and updates;
facebook.com/BubbleWitchSaga2
Twitter @BubbleWitchSaga
https://www.youtube.com/user/BubbleWitchOfficial
http://bubblewitch2saga.com/

Have fun playing Bubble Witch 2 Saga!

Do not sell my data: King shares your personal information with advertising partners to personalize ads. Learn more at https://king.com/privacyPolicy.  If you wish to exercise your Do Not Sell My Data rights, you can do so by contacting us via the in game help centre or by going to https://soporto.king.com/

comments: I did an update last night causing me to lose lives I had stored up, gold bars and even though I beat level 734 over 6 times it will not let me move past. On the Bingo like game it will not give me credit when I clear a space. Unloaded and reloaded no help. Had this game for a long time and this is the first time i had this big problem.

I've been playing ALL the Bubble Witches for years now and I COMPLETELY fell in love with all of them! 🥰 I have a panic disorder and these games help so much to soothe my anxieties and let me focus on the fun! I love this game yet, level 136 can't be passed! The game doesn't give enouh bubbles and with no boosters, it's not passable! Three days trying to advance, is just irritating! I am fixing to uninstall if I don't pass it after today. Ridiculous!

I love bubble witch saga games. However I've wrote twice now about being screwed out of extra bubbles I've purchased and I'm unable to send or receive extra lives from anyone. None of my friends even show up to send lives to and I know a bunch of my friends who play. Fix these issues and give me back the gold I was cheated and ill change my rating.

I love this game but got to level 812 and can no longer pass this level I do not understand what happened either nor where to go to find out why I can not move forward in this game..worked hard to get this high so do not want to start over.but had a blast getting to this level

title: T-Mobile Scam Shield
description:
Scam Shield protects every customer with T-Mobile's advanced scam-blocking technologies—for FREE. And with our Scam Shield app, you can easily manage your anti-scam features. Plus, everything is saved on our network, so your settings will stay, even if you remove the app or get a new phone.



Features included with the T-Mobile Scam Shield app:
•	Scam Block: helps keep all likely scammers off your phone entirely, so you can answer more confidently.
•	Scam Reporting: identifies suspicious callers or fraudsters and helps prevent their calls from being received by you—or others—in the future.
•	Caller ID: reduces unidentified calls by displaying a caller's information, even if they're not in your contact list.
•	Scam Counter: shows you the number of likely scam calls blocked and kept off your phone when Scam Block is turned on, and the number received when it's turned off.
•	Mark Your Favorites: ensures that calls from important numbers always come through—even if they've been labeled as Scam Likely.



Upgrade to Scam Shield Premium to enjoy even more call protection features. 

T-Mobile Scam Shield Premium features:

•	Manage your block list and send calls to voicemail.
•	Send categorized call types to voicemail.
•	Get information with reverse number lookup.
•	Get voicemails texted to you automatically.*
And more!

*Requires additional activation via My T-Mobile or app download.

https://www.t-mobile.com/customers/scam-shield-app

comments: Was working great but I didn't realize it was blocking phone calls from doctor's office, and similar places. No option to program it not to block those numbers so I have to turn the blocking off. Also everything prompts you to go premium...I thought the last uncarrier move said this would be free? Now it just feels like a additional ploy to get money out of us...sneaky.

It's been a long time coming for this app and finally its here Thank you T-mobile I no longer have to go through phone call after phone call. I would get more phone calls from scammers more than my own personal calls on a daily I never wanted to answer my phone cause I just knew it was probably a scam of some sort I can't explain how annoying that is. So thank you so very much T-mobile....

**Response to developer: Scam block is already turned on, it just doesn't work very well. Make the app better instead of blaming your customers please.** Doesn't block very many calls, but has blocked calls from contacts. That can be fixed by adding them to favorites, but it's still annoying. I liked it better when the TMobile system would say "scam likely" which seems to have been discontinued after this app launched. It sounds good but doesn't work very well.

Useless, reroutes spam callers to voicemail. Basic app notifications are locked behind paywall. Just download Google Phone cause unlike this it's free, it works, and you can mark callers as spam from the phone app immediately, unlike this where you wait hours . App has a problem where voicemail calls and unknown numbers call don't appear, so you cannot mark them as spam. The entirety of this should be free for all T-Mobile customers. Better yet opensoure it, so people can fix it.

At first this worked great. I wasn't getting any calls that ever said scam likely. Until the last few weeks I have been receiving four or five calls a day from a number that has the same area code and prefix as my number. I block the number, just to get another call from the same area code and prefix. Of course I don't answer. I block, they change the last four digits in their number and call again within 10 minutes.

title: Call me a Legend - Game of Battle & Love
description:
Playboy x Call Me A Legend

12 beautiful Playmates are trapped in the zombie world. Rescue all the Playmates before they are gone!  
Time is limited for all legends to finish the rescue-missions and set them free from the zombies. They promise to thank you and you won't be disappointed.
Meet the Playmates of the month including Gia, Audrey, Raquel, Stephanie, Sophie, Monica....etc, they are waiting for you to rescue them. 

Call me a Legend is a free RPG game simulation with plenty of love affairs and politics! Become a Legend in the game, which enables you to get rich and gain power! But beware of zombies, because they are lurking behind every corner!

Main features:
✔ Love affairs - Increase intimacy with girls by dating them and giving them gifts. Become a Legend among girls!
✔ Raising a family - Take care of your wife and she will take care of your life and your children. Groom your heirs!
✔ Political games - Get rich and powerful!
✔ Forge Alliances - Recruit heroes which will help you defeat the zombies! 
✔ Develop the camp and upgrade your heroes to make them stronger. Be the top of the legend!
✔ Go on Quests - send expeditions to explore new territories and find more survivors.
✔ Chat online with other players - exchange your experiences! Who is the Legend at the end?
✔ Set the record - We challenge you to try to become the best-ranked player on our worldwide ranking list! Are you the Legend?

Play Call me a Legend for FREE now! Get Rich, Gain Power Now!

© 2020 Playboy Enterprises International, Inc. Playboy and the Rabbit Head Design are trademarks of Playboy Enterprises International, Inc. and used under license by Empire Studios Inc.

comments: Downloaded the game to see what it was about. Waiting for it to load which was exceptionally long load time, only to get to the main background screen and nothing else. Nothing to click on to proceed any further. Just the main screen. Read the reviews for the gane and seems to me like the devs for this gane arent sure what they are doing. Waste of time.

Very challenging game. Excellent girls, can build soldiers to whatever strength you want according to your resources. Would recommend this game if your diligent. The bad, it's a little glitchy, have had 2 uninstall and reinstall several times this last week in order for the game to load. Also likes to disconnect from the server, occasionally it won't reconnect. Once required a reinstall. Fortunately no game play was lost and no penalties. Kudos to the DEVS for the mini game and variety.

The is a good game but it sucks that you have to collect 800 puzzle pieces for most girls and sucks that the girls never get put in the rotation, so I have alot of puzzle pieces and never get the chance to get them, unless they start putting back into rotation then I'm going to delete the game

Beware, extremely low probabilities and undisclosed gacha odds. Did over 150+ searches and did not gain a single point in progression towards a character. Needs more work and bug fixes. Half of the content says "Coming Soon," and even a screen still shows as "Beta testing." Servers are pretty much dead, no social aspect and lacks co-cop related content. Also don't like that some events run at 4am in the morning and only last 2 hours.

Fun enough game if you're patient. The beauties are ridiculous but entertaining and at least they aren't Anime style. There's enough to do to keep you coming back and figure out. Like that if you miss out on something it will come around again in a few months. PTP helps but you don't need to if you're patient and don't mind grinding it out.

title: Vocalyx
description:
VOCALYX is a powerful, but easy to use, Augmentative and Alternative
Communication (AAC) tool that utilizes pictograms, photos, and text to allow its users,
suffering from various speech difficulties, to easily communicate with those around them and
to make daily progress on their path of speech rehabilitation.
 
VOCALYX can be used for both children and adults who suffer from the loss of
communication or language. It is completely malleable, and it addresses all levels of
memory, knowledge, comprehension, reading, and writing.  From a child stricken with
low-functioning autism, to a senior citizen who has had a stroke and now suffers from
aphasia, to someone who has had a tracheotomy or laryngectomy, to someone suffering
from MS, Cerebral Palsy, Lou Gehrig’s Disease, brain trauma or legions, or to a person with
deafness or muteness who wants a convenient way to communicate with people who don’t
know sign language, VOCALYX can be a life changing tool to those who need it.
 
In short, VOCALYX can compensate for three types of speech problems: vocalization
(for example in the case of throat cancer), language (as is the case for aphasics), and
communication (in the case of autism). The principle is simple: you click on an image (a
photo, pictogram, or text box) within a premade or personalized keyboard, and VOCALYX
says the message for you through the use of voice synthesis, or with the recorded voice
of either the user or someone close to him/her.
 
The parameters are 100% customizable to meet the needs of all our individual users. This
includes: the size and number of buttons displayed, the length of button presses (useful
for people who tremble because of Parkinson’s, Lou Gehrig’s, or MS for example), the
synthetic voice (age, gender, speed), and there are several different forms of visual
communication.
 
There are keyboards made up of pictograms, photos, and prewritten phrases, as well as
ABCD and QWERTY keyboards. When using the pictogram and photo keyboards, you have
the option of either using the images we have already provided and organized, uploading
your own personal images, or searching through photo and pictogram databases, like
ARASAAC, MAKATON, or PECS, and downloading a wide selection of images.
 
An internet connection is not required to use VOCALYX, except during the registration
and the initial set up. It is usable in all situations and any normal place one would go on a
daily basis. Take advantage of the free trial and discover how much this AAC tool can help
you or someone you love!  When the free trial is over, you can buy VOCALYX per number of
clicks, or as a 1-time final purchase.
 
VOCALYX Features Summary List:
— Free trial available!
— Pay by number of clicks or as a 1-time final purchase
— Fully mobile, VOCALYX can be used anywhere
— Adaptable to all needs

— Rehabilitation tool with a speech therapy team
— Adaptable synthetic voice (age, gender, speed of speech)
— Record personalized voice messages
— Use personal photos or choose from photos and pictograms offered through the app
— 1000 pre-programmed messages for helping communication
— 800 images and 1200 pictograms available to meet individual needs
— Create your own messages
— QWERTY keyboard with word predict
— An unlimited number of personalized messages
— Combine the use of photos, pictograms, and phrases to send texts/SMS or emails
— Display settings are customizable (button size, number of images shown on each page)
— Share your exercises with your speech therapist

title: Midland Cognitive Assessment
description:
The Midland Cognitive Assessment (MICA) App is a clinical tool designed to help clinicians perform a cognitive assessment at the bedside or in a clinic. It is also a tool that helps to teach techniques for assessing different cognitive domains. 

In the App, we provide tasks to measure impairment of six main cognitive domains: attention and concentration, language, memory, praxis, gnosis, and executive functions. The emphasis is to teach clinical judgment for determining cognitive impairment.
We do not advocate for a global score to determine impairment. 

The MICA App provides a 10 – 20 minute cognitive assessment battery, called the MICA Test, which provides an overview of cognitive performance by including tasks for assessment of the six main cognitive domains. This can be done as a standalone test and provides an indicator of strengths and weaknesses for each of the main cognitive domains. 

We also list the six cognitive domains with assessment tasks for each to examine the individual domains more closely. This is useful when a clinician wants to limit testing to a specific domain. The tasks have been selected based on experience and are more specific for the domain as listed but overlap will always occur and the clinician must review the accompanying instruction booklet for further information. 

Cognitive tests for common clinical scenarios in neuropsychiatric practice are provided. This version of the App starts with a short assessment battery for depression. Future updates will include batteries for early and moderate stage Alzheimer’s disease, vascular dementia, frontotemporal dementia, and schizophrenia. These batteries give guidance for clinicians regarding appropriate cognitive assessment for a given situation.  

An educational booklet and videos are provided to educate and explain the tasks. The user of this App is strongly advised to go through this before using the App. 

The MICA App does not provide medical advice for treatment and cannot replace clinical decision making. It is intended for clinicians familiar with this type of assessment. Use of this App is at your own risk.

title: Kraków for a disabled tourist
description:
Kraków – the city bustling with life, abundant with historical monuments and attractions – draws tourists from all over the world like a magnet. The former capital of Poland has been always open to visitors. Recently it has become more friendly to persons with disabilities.
This tourist application is a vade mecum for tourists with disabilities. It contains information on the city’s major attractions and useful tips for the disabled, in particular those moving on wheelchairs.
The newest version of the app also contains an audio guide. Thanks to the “Close by” notification system integrated with automated audio you can go on a tour of Krakow and listen about its monuments without even taking the phone out of your pocket.
Specifically for visually impaired users the audio includes all the information featured in the guide.
We invite you to visit Kraków, and hope this application will help you to explore this very special city.

title: Energy Ring - General Edition!
description:
Energy Ring is exclusive for Google Pixel 4A, OnePlus 8, OnePlus 8 Pro, OnePlus Nord, Realme X50 Pro, Samsung Galaxy Note 20 Ultra, A60, A51, A71, S10 Lite, Z Flip, m40, m31s, Motorola Edge and Edge +, OPPO Find X2/Pro/Neo, Vivo iQOO 3 5G, Z1 Pro, Xiaomi Mi 10/Pro, Poco X2, Redmi K30/i/5/Racing, Note 9/Pro/Max/9S, Huawei Honor 20, View 20, Nova 4, 5T, P40 Lite, P40 Pro, Motorola One Action, One Vision, Realme 6/Pro/i and Moto G(8) Power only

If you have a device with punch hole camera, reach out via email to get support added!

Similar Apps for other Devices:
Energy Ring - Galaxy S20/Ultra/5G/+ - http://bit.ly/ers20
Energy Ring - Galaxy S10/e/5G/+ - http://bit.ly/e_ring
Energy Ring for Galaxy Note 10/5G/+ - http://bit.ly/er_note10
Energy Bar Curved Edition for S8/S9/S10/+ - http://bit.ly/ebc_xda
Energy Bar Curved Edition for Note 8/9 - http://bit.ly/ebc8_xda
Energy Bar - http://bit.ly/eb_xda

Adds a configurable Energy Ring around the camera lens indicating current Battery level. Dive into the various configuration options, not only you can quickly glance and get the battery info but, Energy Ring adds an accent to your phone's camera lens.


Got a full charge? The Ring will be a 360 degree wrap around the front camera lens.
Battery depleting? So will the arc of Energy Ring.

Out of the box features:-

✓ Energy Ring can be configured from a width of 1 pixel to a donut thick ring
✓ Energy Ring puts almost 0% load on CPU, as it wakes up only to reflect any change in battery level
✓ Energy Ring's direction can be configured as clockwise/bidirectional/anti-clockwise
✓ Energy Ring can hide on fullscreen content (apps, videos, images, games etc)
✓ Energy Ring can be configured to change colors automatically depending on the live battery level
✓ Energy Ring could have a mono color/multiple color segments/gradient (pro)
✓ You can literally assign any color in the world for your favorite configuration
✓ Energy Ring has a number of cool animations whenever a power source is plugged into your device


All that is cool! But what about Energy Ring consuming Battery?!

This is one of the most exciting question for me to answer. Energy Ring more than anything understands that you need to utilize your battery efficiently (after all, that's why you installed the App, right? ;) .) Energy Ring sits on the screen silently putting almost 0% load on CPU, if battery level changes, Android wakes up Energy Ring. Once awake, Energy Ring quickly updates itself and goes back to sleep. And to be that extra efficient, the Ring goes on deep sleep when you turn off the screen, meaning it doesn't even read changes in battery level when the screen is off.

Accessibility Service Requirement:
Android requires Energy Ring to run as an Accessibility Service, to be able to display on Lock Screen. It does not read/monitor any data, whatsoever. This is especially useful for people who have disability to read numbers and work better with visual data.

No charging animation?
Settings > Accessibility > Visibility enhancements > Remove Animations > uncheck if it's checked. 


Energy Ring disappearing on Xiaomi devices?
Setting>Apps>Manage apps>Energy Ring> *Turn on Autostart*

Screen burn-in:
The original variant of the App, Energy Bar has been used over several years by users on their AMOLED devices, there has been no complains. But there is no claim that it may not happen.

Re-enable after exiting power saving mode:
If you enter into power saving mode, Energy Ring will be disabled by the System, to re-activate you must restart your device.

Samsung automatically moves few pixels every now and then to avoid screen burn-in which includes Energy Ring moving away from its original position. This change in position will however be visible only when you have set its thickness to minimum.

100,000+ downloads, thanks for the support, everyone!

Remote Update: Added support for Realme 6i, Note 9/ Pro Max (new variants), Galaxy M31s Note 20 Ultra, Find X2 Neo, Pixel 4A.

comments: I really like the placement of this power visual. The fact that it uses an almost impossible space as a battery meter is GENIUS. It uses very little resources. I can tell at a glance where my power level is at. The customizations are right on the money, not to many and not difficult to adjust. BUY THIS APP ! Thank You, for a job superbly done!

I love the app, but after you close it using the list with the opened apps as cards (usually the square button on the bottom), the ring seems to disappear, and unable to reappear (app keeps saying that I didn't turn on Energy Ring, while I did), forcing me to clear all app data, also resetting my options. I did turn on battery saving on the app to no restrictions. My phone is Redmi Note 9 Pro.

This works as it should and I love it. Really love the way you can select the colours yourself for it. Paid for the app to support it. My problem is the popup telling me about the settings and the "we don't support forever on because of screen damage. They always crop up at the wrong moments and I find that frustrating. Any way to turn them off?

Very clever and efficient use of the camera punch-hole. Works well on my OnePlus Nord as I was using the built-in battery circle option before. Minor grumbles: 1. The Ring Origin angle could do with snapping every 90° and the actual value displayed. 2. Choosing white for the Color Configuration still has white text on the white background. 3. The middle of the punch-hole is filled black, not left transparent - only seen when taking a screenshot.

I have been using this app on my OnePlus 8 phone. It's working fine as of now, however an irritating issue of "Information" popup with a guide on Battery Optimization appears on every restart of the phone. The popup keeps on appearing even after going through the complete guide every time. Developers should take care of this bug soon as this is an interesting app and users would want to take advantage of it without getting so annoyed.

title: Knock'em All
description:
The most impressive game of 2020 so far! 
Jump from building to building and shoot the dummies to destabilize them and make them fall from the top!

The best players manage to chain sections together by stepping on them in just a few seconds. 

Simple and intuitive controls and addictive gameplay mechanics.
descriptionHTML:
The most impressive game of 2020 so far!
Jump from building to building and shoot the dummies to destabilize them and make them fall from the top!

The best players manage to chain sections together by stepping on them in just a few seconds.

Simple and intuitive controls and addictive gameplay mechanics.
summary: Make everything falls apart!
developerAddress: 4 rue Jules Lefebvre, 75009 Paris
recentChanges: Overall optimization.
comments: Ridiculously easy. Limited scenarios. Once guns are maxed out, the challenge is gone. It's a little fun up to level 100-150, but then it's just repetitive. Developers need to increase the strength of the dummies to make them more difficult to kill, or more aggressive. Will reconsider playing if developers actually develop a progressive level of difficulty. Not going to be a money maker as I won't pay for the different balls and boosts.

I dont understand it, I delete this game because it starts to seem repetitious (if I spelled that right), and next thing you know Im downloading it all over again. About 8 times now. Got up to level 1000. Devel. team IMO you need more updates like new characters and locations. The one dude in the "ball machine" is corny tho". Just my op. Overall its a good game that has the possibility of being great. You guys are golden.

No BS. Other games claim to be addictive. Literally paid the 5bucks... I just completed Lvl 3500 with no intention of stopping 🤣 its true. This is literally a splatter game with no challenge but headshots are so satisfying. It would be nice if it were a bit beefier at higher levls but so what? Its a phone app. I do my serious gaming on XBox. This is a Time "Chiller".

It's one of the most funniest games I've ever seen, I'm level 150 at my first day 😂 The only thing that is not good, is the variety of robots. It only has 3 kinds of robots and I like if it would have more kinds of robots. Please add more 👌

Well I think that this game is fab. I'm now on level 70. I like the upgraded guns. I like how the men get blown away or you blow their heads off 🤣. Different situations. Different guns and different robots. It's just run, easy and I like it.

title: Currents
description:
Currents by G Suite allows you to connect with your colleagues while you’re in the office or on the go.
• Exchange ideas and documents, and have meaningful discussions with your colleagues — all without flooding your inbox.
• Enjoy the most important content first, with the ability to order your home stream by relevance or time.
• Connect with like-minded colleagues and find communities that match your interests.
• Follow tags on topics. Learn more about what is happening in other departments and across the organization with trending tags.
• Highlighted posts from your leadership keep you up-to-date on what’s important across your organization.
• Use Google’s advanced search to find topics and conversations that matter to you.
Currents is available for G Suite customers only. Check with your G Suite IT Administrator to learn more.
